DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess effect standardize postoperative bowel regimen over-the-counter medication subject undergo minimally invasive urogynecologic surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Bowel Function After Minimally Invasive Urogynecologic Surgery
DOC.criteria: Planning admit hospital undergo minimallyinvasive urogynecologic surgery Strong Memorial Hospital . Procedures may include : robotassisted laparoscopic sacrocolpopexy sacrospinous ligament suspension uterosacral ligament suspension/paravaginal defect repair colpocleisis cystocele repair Additional procedure may include : hysterectomy adnexectomy culdoplasty minimally invasive sling procedure ( TVT TOT ) periurethral collagen injection enterocele repair Planning undergo laparotomy . Undergoing rectocele perineocele repair part surgery . Taking Miralax , laxatives , enema , suppository daily , time enrollment . Presence colostomy . Chronic kidney disease Insulindependent diabetes mellitus Known cardiac disease Gastric ulcer Difficulty swallow esophageal stricture Persistent nausea vomit Signs symptom consistent bowel obstruction
